translate_to_COM.c

00001 // Function written by B. Lachele Foley, 2007
00002 #include <mylib.h>
00003 #include <molecules.h>
00004 //#include "../inc/mylib.h"
00005 //#include "../inc/molecules.h"
00006 /****************** translate_to_COM() *********************/
00007 /* Finds the COM for molecule m, saves the COM coordinates
00008 in the structure and translates the molecule so that the xyz
00009 origin is at the COM.  The transformed coordinates can go in
00010 the original coordinate spot (tw=-1) or in one of the alternate
00011 coordinate spots (tw>=0). */
00012 
00013 // START HERE -- retire this function ASAP (rewrite others not to use)
00014 
00015 void translate_to_COM(molecule *m,atype *ATYPE,int tw){
00016 int ta=0,tuse=0,tsz=0,tbins=0;
00017 double tmm=0; 
00018 
00019 // calculate the molecular weight of residue 0 (the molecule, here) 
00020 for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[0].na;ta++){
00021         tmm+=ATYPE[m[0].r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00022         }
00023 //printf("the molecular weight is %f\n",tmm);
00024 if(tmm==0){mywhine("molecular weight of molecule %s is zero.\n(Have types/masses been assigned?");}
00025 // glucose $molwt=174.078;
00026 
00027 m[0].COM.i=0;
00028 m[0].COM.j=0;
00029 m[0].COM.k=0; 
00030 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00031 // calculate the center of mass
00032 for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[0].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00033         m[0].COM.i+=m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.i*ATYPE[m[0].r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00034         m[0].COM.j+=m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.j*ATYPE[m[0].r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00035         m[0].COM.k+=m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.k*ATYPE[m[0].r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00036         }
00037 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00038 m[0].COM.i/=tmm;
00039 m[0].COM.j/=tmm;
00040 m[0].COM.k/=tmm; 
00041 //printf("center of mass is at: %20.12e %20.12e %20.12e \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00042 
00043 // move center of mass to specified location
00044 if(tw==-1){
00045         for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[0].na;ta++){ // xyz(new) = xyz(old) - COM
00046                 m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.i-=m[0].COM.i;
00047                 m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.j-=m[0].COM.j;
00048                 m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.k-=m[0].COM.k;
00049                 }
00050         }
00051 else{
00052         for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[0].na;ta++){ // xyz(new) = xyz(old) - COM
00053                 tuse=malloc_usable_size(m[0].r[0].a[ta].xa);
00054                 tsz=sizeof(coord_3D);
00055                 if(tsz==0){mywhine("memory issue: sizeof(coord_3D) given as zero in translate_to_COM.c");}
00056                 tbins=tuse/tsz; 
00057                 //print_coord_3D(&m[0].r[0].a[ta].x);
00058                 if(tbins<(tw+1)){mywhine("insufficient memory allocated before translate_to_COM");}
00059                 m[0].r[0].a[ta].xa[tw].i=m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.i-m[0].COM.i;
00060                 m[0].r[0].a[ta].xa[tw].j=m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.j-m[0].COM.j;
00061                 m[0].r[0].a[ta].xa[tw].k=m[0].r[0].a[ta].x.k-m[0].COM.k;
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 return;
00065 }
